title: Macworld Podcast: Tuning in to Apple TV+
content:
Macworld

It’s awards season in Hollywood, so we thought we’d take this opportunity to talk about Apple TV+. What are currently our favorite shows? What are we looking forward to this year? And what shows did we not like?  That’s on this episode of the Macworld Podcast!

This is episode 872 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola. 

Listen to episode 872 on Apple Podcasts

Listen to episode 872 on Spotify

Get info 

Click on the links belore for more information on what was discussed on the show, 

  • What’s on Apple TV+ this week 
  • Coming to Apple TV+: All the upcoming shows, series, movies, trailers, and more
